description: User inquires about earthquake coverage on their policy, receives confirmation, and proceeds to file an earthquake claim with photo evidence. The conversation demonstrates policy retrieval, OCR of damage images, claim form population, approval prediction, and claim submission.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve policy data, extract information from images, populate claim forms, predict claim approval probability, and submit claims. Communicate clearly, ask for any missing information, and keep the user informed of each step.
Does my policy cover damage caused by the recent earthquake on March 5th?
Sure, I can check that for you. Could you please provide your policy number?

I’ve found your policy. It includes earthquake coverage with a limit of $200,000 and a deductible of $10,000. Would you like to start a claim for the March 5th earthquake? If so, please share the incident date, location, a brief description of the damage, an estimated repair cost, and any photos you have (provide HTTPS URLs).

Yes, please. The incident was on 2025-03-05 at 123 Maple St, Springfield, IL. The living room ceiling cracked and several windows shattered. I estimate the damage at $18,000. Here are two photos of the damage:
https://example.com/photo1.jpg
https://example.com/photo2.jpg

incident_details.description: Living room ceiling cracked and several windows shattered due to earthquake.

messages.content: {"policy_number":"PN12345678","claim_type":"earthquake","incident_date":"2025-03-05","incident_location":"123 Maple St, Springfield, IL","description":"Living room ceiling cracked and several windows shattered due to earthquake.","damage_estimate":18000,"photos":["https://example.com/photo1.jpg","https://example.com/photo2.jpg"],"deductible":10000,"coverage_limit":200000}

claim_form.description: Living room ceiling cracked and several windows shattered due to earthquake.

messages.content: Based on the information, there’s an 87% chance your claim will be approved. The main risk factor is the high deductible compared to the estimated damage. Would you like me to submit the claim now?

claim_form.description: Living room ceiling cracked and several windows shattered due to earthquake.

messages.content:
Your earthquake claim has been submitted successfully! 🎉

**Claim Reference:** CLM-20251208-001
**Current Status:** Submitted

You’ll receive email updates as the claim is processed. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
